data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is an extension to DBIx::Class::ResultSet that adds one
    additional method. It can also be used functionally. It is useful
    for saving changes/creating new data structures built from related
    records into the database and is currently used by HTML::FormHandler
    for saving form data into the DBIx::Class model.
